select b.account_id,count(*) as cnt from sys_workgroup_account a left join sys_account b on a.SYSACCOUNT_ID = b.id left join act_ru_task c on b.account_id = c.assignee_ where a.WORKGROUP_ID = '41757f87fe683ec1'
and timestampdiff(SECOND,b.last_heartbeat_time,now()) <= 30
group by b.account_id
